name: bauhinia flag
comment:
The flag of the Republic of Bauhinia.

In the middle of the flag is a bauhinia flower with leaves behind it, the symbol of the Republic of Bauhinia. The flower grows in the subtropics — all throughout Bauhinia — and blooms in the winter. It stands for the core Bauhinia values of family, harmony, and love.

name: mssb stamp confidential
comment: This is the stamp the Ministry of State Security stamps on its *confidential* documents.

name: mssb stamp
comment: This is the stamp the Ministry of State Security stamps on its documents.

name: bauhinia police symbol
comment:
I had so much fun drawing all these bauhinia variations. This is the symbol of the Bauhinian police, or the Public Security Bureau of Bauhinia.

The flower petals are presented as sharp blades, symbolizing the will of the police force in safeguarding the Bauhinian people.

name: buttercup stand
comment:
Buttercup! She's so cool and badass.

I drew her on a piece of hotel scratch paper, and later turned that picture digital.

name: cms friends
comment: Something I drew out of boredom and never bothered to shade.

name: fanton flag
comment: The flag of the Republic of Fanton.

name: icicle old
comment: Icicle was an old character I cut. He was meant to be a co-investigator with Sparky, but I cut him because 1) I have one too many characters, 2) it's better for Sparky to be on her own, and 3) I don't have a reasonable explanation about why they didn't just make Icicle investigate by himself when *he* first arrived. So, bye, Icicle.

name: int
comment: This is pure shitpost. Peacock asks the three kids what "int" stands for. They each have their own answers.

name: melody old
comment: This is an old picture, but honestly Melody hasn't changed.

name: melody sparky tephra
comment:
Tephra, Sparky, and Melody as adults. They all became what's opposite of themselves.

Tephra is a cop, maintainer of law and order, when he used to live a life of crime. Sparky is a bodyguard for Animus, living for other people, guarding the interests of the few. Melody is a private detective, meddling in other people's affairs, when he used to keep to himself and mind only his own business.

name: peacock family
comment: Peacock's family, all mysteriously happy. This is an old drawing; now, Amber never met Ironheart. And Fantasy's necklace should be light blue.

name: potato thumb
comment: Potato is another character I cut. He was originally Tomato's twin brother, and the mailman. Now Alaska is the mailman.

name: sparky and nightsun spinning
comment: Considered obsolete since Sparky's new adult design has a shorter scarf and a scar over her right eye.

name: sparky elegance glowbugs
comment:
This is some vague plot idea in my head, that Elegance and Sparky got kidnapped and that's what set Sparky on her path as a bodyguard.

The song is 虫儿飞, or Glowbugs Fly. I translated the lyrics because I like it and I don't think anyone else ever translated them. I am not a translator and two of my worst school subjects are Chinese and English, so don't yell.

name: cosmo alaska subway
comment:
I don't draw these that often, so here it is: Cosmo and Alaska on a late-night subway.

Can't be sure if this is canon though. I mean, right now in [Hillslope](/world/bauhinia/coastline/hillslope/) there aren't any *subways* of course, and I haven't really thought about what they're going to do after leaving Hillslope.
